line.originaltext: 1 cup rye flour
3/4 cup all-purpose flour
1/4 cup sugar
2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon caraway seeds
3/4 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
1 egg, beaten
3/4 cup milk
1/3 cup vegetable oil
In a large bowl, combine the flours, sugar, baking powder, salt and caraway seeds.
In a large bowl, combine the flours, sugar, baking powder, salt and caraway seeds.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5}, ing10, "flour mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the flours, sugar, baking powder, salt and caraway seeds.
Stir in cheese.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing6}, ing11, "cheese mix", "stir in cheese")

line.originaltext: Combine the egg, milk and oil; stir into the dry ingredients just until moistened.
Combine the egg, milk and oil; stir into the dry ingredients just until moistened.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12}, ing13, "muffin mix", "stir in until just moistened")

line.originaltext: Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full.
Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes or a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes or a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
line.annotation: cook(ing13, t2, ing14, "baked muffins", "Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes ")

line.originaltext: Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-23 minutes or a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing14,"a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean")

line.originaltext: Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
Serve warm.
